originalText: ::The old woman raises her head as much as her humped back allows and looks upon your face.::
::Untouched by the waterfall she must've passed through, the old woman stares at you, the trespasser.::
I treat wounds. I have medication.
::She shakes her head, her eyes glued to a plastic compartment box with dried mushrooms she seems to be sorting.:: I won't take him in.

::You catch her in deep concentration.:: 

Something is different... 

I no longer feel his presence...
What are you doing here? Get out.
Keep your claws away from him, you rat!
Didn't mean to disturb you. Goodbye.
I'll be on my way. Sorry to have bothered you.
I don't know what you're talking about.
I didn't come to talk about that.
I'm terribly sorry, I didn't know what was inside the cave.
::She clenches her bony hands into rigid, spastic claws.::
::She returns to her work without uttering a word.::
::She waves you to follow her inside.::
::She nods once then shakes her head nervously.:: I won't. Tell Grim I won't.

::[Mercantile]:: I noticed you have a lot of difficult-to-obtain substances. As someone who makes great use of these I am more than willing to pay a lot of money for not having to look for them myself. So if you happen to have something you haven't shown me...
You are with the Grim Jetters, right?
How did you end up joining the pirates?
Are there more psionics in the Grim Jetters' ranks?
You can feel psionic emissions. Have you ever felt anything coming from the hospital to the east of Port Ceto?
Do you know anything about the Jaws monolith?
I heard you might know something about the Jaws monolith.
I heard the Black Eels killed your son.
Katya, will you now tell me about your son?
About what happened in the cave...
Why didn't you ever return to Fatherland? Would they accept you back?
I said: Get out! ::Her hands begin to tremble, yet her expression remains unchanged.::
Now you know. Now you get out!

::She takes a good look at you.::

Ten charons.
::Her eyes lose focus for a moment, her attention clearly elsewhere.::
No. There were some psionics here, but they... were sent under.

::She stares at you, clenching her bony hand into a claw.::

Eels... Rats.

No. They would not. The life I led... I threw away family, tradition - all the teachings. But not because they are bad teachings; the older I am the more I realize they are good. But the people who held them... I hated the teachings because I hated the people.
What you saw here... stays with you.
On the other hand, it's only a flesh wound.
I have had this dream. I found myself alone in the darkness, naked...
I have been having these dreams. They all start with me being alone in the darkness, naked...
Don't you worry about me and just tell me what you know about it, alright?
I will tell you, then. I will tell you.
I would really like to know.
I was not stupid for what I wanted. I was stupid for the way I tried to achieve it.
I don't mean to be disrespectful, but...
It's too much for me. No. Too much.
I see. Perhaps there are some other goods you'd prefer to money. Leather, fungi, plants, organs? Medication you do not possess? I can get you anything.
What do you say? It's a great way to earn some coin.
No. I don't do that. I take care of the ill and wounded, and I help with whatever I can.
And large serpentine eyes were staring at you.
How much do you know about the shamans?
Let's talk about the shamans again.
That message seems to be primarily directed at the expedition, as you said the dreams started when it arrived.
What about that dream I had? In which I was the serpent?
I had a different dream this time. In this one I was the serpent.
I'd like to change the subject for now.

It is a tortured soul that spoke in pure emotion, in nothing but intense pain. Few can interpret that, fewer are willing, and even fewer can do anything about it.

::Her stare departs for a moment before returning to you.:: Recently I have felt great distress coming from there. Greater than I've ever felt.
The monolith holds knowledge few people can understand; it also holds risks many will fall prey to.

To understand the monolith you need *Will*. Intelligence solves problems. Strength moves things. But Will is control over oneself, Will is persistence and perseverance - Will is focus; Will is to not allow anything to distract or divert you from what you must do. Only with Will can you understand the monolith, and I don't think you have it.
::She looks north.:: They... the Serpentborn - they fear it very much. Their shamans know something about the nature of the monolith that we do not; they must have a good reason to fear it.

They shot him... Razor brought him back on his jet. I tried to help him, but I couldn't. He would not breathe in my hands. ::She raises them in front of her face, inspecting them with eyes that only briefly reveal sorrow. She then places her hands on the table.::

Rats upon the Black Eel who shot him. Ravenous rats!
The man you saw in that cave, he is Niki - Nikola, my son, my baby.
You wouldn't understand. No one can understand.
No buts! Get out! There is nothing for you here! Get. *out*!
::She falls silent and focuses on sorting her mushrooms.::

::She remains motionless for a few moments then walks toward her bed, disappearing from view. She returns with a medium-sized rectangular plastic box full of variegated ampules, vials, bottles and such, each properly labeled, and places it on the table for your to see.:: 

Here.
To ingrain the message more firmly than language ever could.
Not much. They are priests. They speak to the dead and perform sacred rituals. That much I have felt.
True. It is aimed at them, but our inner self hears it still.
At its peak I sensed relief, then it all ended.
It grew and grew in intensity, and then it stopped. But it is still there.
I hear it all the time: "You can't do this, you can't do that..." Why won't people just let me do my thing?
I will stay away from it, then.
I'm sure you will go there.
What that reason is exactly? I don't know. But it has to do with the how its nature and their nature interact on some level I cannot describe.

::She listens carefully but displays neither surprise nor awe regarding a single word you've said.::

I see.
You are lucky to be alive.
What you see is what you get.
That is... unusual. That is not what the rest of us dreamt.
Some of us have been sharing these dreams.
Also, we do not understand their language. The language of inner self - dreams - we do. It's a language they command well.

They are spiriters. They speak to the dead and perform sacred rituals... rituals involving serpents and horrible things. I can feel all of this, sometimes faintly, sometimes strongly, but the presence I feel the most is the presence of the High Spiriter.
Do you know anything about the High Shaman?
I see. There was something else...
Everyone in the Black Sea can hear it, but it seems to affects the most the people on the expedition's island, or people more sensitive to it, like me.
To sum it up, I am in the dark, but I am not blind. I see small trembling eyes that provoke hunger. The last thing I feel is triumph.
You did? Then why ask about this one?
Men that didn't fear the monolith enough have left their remains there. Heed their warning.
But just because they fear it more doesn't mean we shouldn't fear it at all.
That is the same thing I saw.
It started when the expedition arrived.
U... Uyen... surm. Serpent Eyes. I know about him. I've felt his presence.

So, the elements are these:

It is dark, but you are not blind: you possess some sacred, esoteric knowledge.

Cold dirt: unwelcome environment.

Nakedness: nature.

Trembling eyes: innermost fear, weakness.

Hunger: instinct, nature again.

Triumph...
But you will try again later. I feel it.
::She eyes you tentatively.:: Then I have to tell you about myself.
I can tell that you need someone to talk to.
I don't know. I just do.
You need to sort yourself out. How can you help anyone else if you can't help yourself?
::[Intelligence]:: Do the dreams have anything to do with the native shamans?
::[Intelligence]:: I'm guessing it's somehow related to the natives.
You've had plenty of time to think about it, then.
He speaks directly to the Serpent and acts upon its will. And it is he who actually speaks through dreams. He is the most powerful of the spiriters.

The message is the same, but the perspective is opposite: Different inner selves interpet it differently. Then it means the message is a truth, but a truth concerned purely with the nature of the Serpentborn.
Yes. It drew me near just like it draws everyone.

::She makes a lengthy pause, but just as you started thinking of saying something, she takes a deep, slow breath and begins.:: I left Fatherland as a young woman. I was gifted, so I was told. I felt with my mind what ailed others, and it was to be... used to help people. Many came to me, looking for help... non-stop. I spent my youth healing them with my mind, giving them lekovnitze - herb mushrooms - but eventually I grew to hate everyone: Mother, Father, everyone - Fatherland. They cared about my gift but not about me... except for Bryan, a traveler from Underrail.

::After a moment of thought she shakes her head.::

Leave it.
::She gives you a long look.:: Yes...

::After a moment of hesitation she pulls in the makeshift stool behind her and sits on it, resting her hands in her lap.:: Oh... ::Then she looks at you.:: 

Dreams, they are a means of communication. It is our inner self trying to tells us the truths we don't accept or understand. These truths come in form of ideas, images, emotions and intuitions, because that is the language the inner self speaks, and in our foolishness we often dismiss them because they depart from what we think is real; but dreams do not distort reality - they reveal it. They reveal it.
What can you tell me about the Serpent?
But why would you interpret the message like that? Why is your inner self like theirs?
Then what are your thoughts on it?

This *symbolism* of dreams is not always clear, yet sometimes it seems apparent - but that is a trap. Not because the dreams lie, no, no, but because we might only scratch the surface of the truth we are trying to obtain, so we turn our inner ear away before we've even heard the whole message, thinking we've received it.
I know little, but even little is too horrible to mention.
Come to think of it, it may be because I was using some native-made stimulants before I went to sleep.
I know where it is. I've been there. But I was from another place, Brezna.

::She pulls out a handkerchief to wipe her tears with, an unusual one that is colorful and rich in vine-like mushroom motifs. It looks as old as she is.::

He took me away, and I did not look back. ::She says, her eyes gleaming.:: But he was no mere traveler but an outlaw, a criminal. I knew who he was, but I didn't care. To me he was... good. Me, him, and his gang, his "pack"... we traveled across Underrail, leading a... horrible life. They did bad things to others, and themselves, and I did the same. I used my powers for an ill purpose, and used my freedom to hurt myself.
Then it is clear: These stimulants have infected your nature. That is why the dreams are different.
It's a symbolic message. What I saw does not correspond to real events but instead reveals something fundamental about the One.
I think it means literally what I saw. It depicts this One as someone who holds great power which he shows in front of the king.
I'm still trying to figure it out.
And you left Brezna with Bryan?

I was free from my name too. Katarina became Katie. ::She frowns.:: I was stupid. Stupid! He promised so much, but gave me nothing. ::Sniffs.:: Nothing but petty... petty riches and drugs to keep me calm. 

I wanted a child. But that life made it... difficult for me to...
Foolish of you. Hope that these effects aren't permanent.
::She nods.:: I understand what you mean.

Let's explore the elements one by one:

Darkness: fear, mystery - not knowing.

Cold: loneliness, sorrow, dread.

Nakedness: innocence - or rather helplessness.

Eyes, a symbol with many meanings: awakening - perhaps to a truth - introspection,  gateway into the soul...

Suffocation: death.

That is an unusual one. I had never experienced it, I or anyone I know.

I'll first interpret the dream I have been having: I'm alone in the cold darkness, when two gigantic serpentine eyes flash and call me near. Then I feel the cold scales, and I suffocate.

It clearly revolves around "the One." He is important. He is the bringer of light and the bringer of death, but whether he is a servant of good or evil is unclear. Both light and death can be interpreted in many different ways.

I finally did give birth to Niki. He was the only child I was gifted with. His father was shot like a rat for some petty crime when Niki was five, but he grew up just like him, an outlaw. He has his blood; there was nothing I could do about it... and I could not offer him a better life. I took care of Niki wherever he went, for whomever he worked. I was always accepted because... ::sniffs:: because of my healing abilities.

::She pushes you back.::

Don't touch me.
The message is this: You've come here, not knowing what awaits you; you are unwelcome, but you will not go back; we will show you our nature - and you will die.

Years passed... and we came here. Here... here it is better than anywhere we've been before. Niki built me a house, and he was respected among the Jetters.

But then he was shot... my only child was shot. My blood. My only...
He could be anyone. Maybe it's not a he but a she, or something else. A being from the past, from the future, independent of time or reality. He could be an ideal: A hero, or a villain.
Niki is everything to me... everything. There is a way to heal him, but... I have to be patient.

::She sits down for a moment, pressing her lower back as.:: Oh... ::She then looks at you.::

But all that is beyond. ::She waves it away.:: Who knows.
::As more tears roll down her cheeks, she buries her face in the clenched handkerchief and weeps.::

This is not a message from our inner self. It is too clear, untruthful and detached. It is a message *passed on* by our inner self. The mind can extend beyond brain matter and affect the world - psionically. These dreams are nothing but messages from outside minds speaking to our inner self so that it may pass it to us as the truth.

::She leans forward and hits you in the upper chest.::

No! No more!
::She wipes her tears as you leave.::

::She wipes her tears, throws her now-messy handkerchief in a basket and puts on her usual expression.::

No more about Niki.
From the shamans. From the Serpentborn shamans.
